companyDetails: Subsidiary of SMEC International Pty Ltd.
responsibilities: Oversee a wide range of surveys including topographic, geotechnical, transportation, environmental, and social/resettlement. Lead and manage a skilled team to ensure successful execution.

Support Comprehensive Survey Operations: Aid senior engineers and surveyors in preliminary site visits, data collection, and survey control setup. Maintain meticulous survey records and perform quality checks to ensure accurate and error-free data.

Effective Project Collaboration: Collaborate closely with project teams to ensure surveys align with project needs and timelines. Provide regular updates on survey progress and contribute to maintaining high-quality survey data.

companyDetails: Regional branch of Midstream & Terminal Services LLC
responsibilities: Assisted senior team members in surface water management plans, floodplain analysis, drainage strategy, drainage impact assessments.
Worked with senior team members in developing drainage solutions for highways and infrastructures.
Designed SuDS (swales, detention ponds) according to relevant standard and guidelines.
Reviewed drawings for competence and compliance with client requirements.

companyDetails: Sister Concern of Environment and Infrastructure Management Solution (EIMS) Limited.
responsibilities: Supervised field test (SPT, SCPT, and CPT) and laboratory index tests, Consolidation Test, Unconfined Compression Test, Direct Shear Test.
Performed analysis on the soil test and prepared geotechnical investigation report based on the laboratory test data for various projects.
Quality control assurance, maintaining site management and expenses, monitoring investigation progress.
Preliminary assessment of various factory buildings.
